ConfigItem.Desc: 1 = Enable Low Battery intelligent Power Management, 0 = Disable Low Battery intelligent Power Management.

ConfigItem.Id: Action to perform when streaming music and the battery level is getting low whilst charging
ConfigItem.Desc: Action to prevent audio quality from deteriorating due to operating with battery at Gas Gauge 0 or Gas Gauge Low whilst charging.

enum.key: Limit maximum volume level until charger is disconnected and level is above Gas Gauge 0

ConfigItem.Id: Maximum volume level limit whilst charging when the battery is getting low [%]
ConfigItem.Desc: If 'Limit maximum volume level until charger is disconnected and level is above Gas Gauge 0' then this is the maximum volume level expressed as a percentage, e.g. 50% would represent step 8 out of 16 volume steps. This limit is maintained until battery level is above Gas Gauge 0 and the charger cable is disconnected. If level is 0% then the volume limitation is disabled.
